vote.title: A public hearing to receive comments amending chapter 15D, “Emergency Vehicles,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Sections 15D-15, 15D-16, 15D-17, 15D-21, 15D-22, 15D-50, 15D-52, 15D-53, 15D-55, and 15D-56; (1) providing a definition of dispatcher; (2) clarifying language concerning emergency wrecker service; (3) providing a penalty not to exceed $1,000.00; (4) providing a saving clause; (5) providing a severability clause; and (6) providing an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: A public hearing to receive comments amending chapter 15D, “Emergency Vehicles,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Sections 15D-15, 15D-16, 15D-17, 15D-21, 15D-22, 15D-50, 15D-52, 15D-53, 15D-55, and 15D-56; (1) providing a definition of dispatcher; (2) clarifying language concerning emergency wrecker service; (3) providing a penalty not to exceed $1,000.00; (4) providing a saving clause; (5) providing a severability clause; and (6) providing an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
